content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Tricky, yet definitely doable in a short amount of time. Nice problem!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fastest Game mode is good for this puzzle

Goal
* Please rewrite as follows:

Given a string and a list of words, look for all occurrences of the words in the string, and replace every letter in those occurrences with an asterisk ({{*}}).

Words may overlap, appear out of order, or be repeated in the string.

Input
* Please change "consisting only uppercase letters" to "to be modified".

* Please change "words" to "[[words]] to look for in [[string]]".

Output
* Please rewrite as follows:

[[string]] modified in accordance with the statement.

Constraints
* Please rewrite as follows:

0 < length([[string]]), length([[words]]) < 1000
All letters in [[string]] and [[words]] are in uppercase.
Words are not repeated in the list of [[words]].

Stub generator
* Please change 600000 and 60000 to 1000.

* Please add a write statement, e.g. "write answer".

Thanks.
